headline: The U.S.’s pursuit of oil tankers around Venezuela is part of a new legal strategy under the Trump administration to seize ships that transport black market oil around the world, according to Justice Department officials
The Justice Department released a second trove of files related to Epstein, including a fake Austrian passport and copies of Epstein’s will that listed several of his powerful friends as executors
Brown University places its police chief on leave after mass shooting attack
Zelensky warns Putin may be plotting Christmas strike on Kyiv as hopes for holiday miracle truce fade
Mexican navy plane was on medical mission before fatal Texas crash
The Supreme Court on Tuesday blocked President Trump from sending the National Guard into the Chicago area
Epstein email shows feds tried to contact 10 ‘co-conspirators’ — including billionaire retail magnate behind Victoria’s Secret
President Trump said he wants to pressure America’s largest defense contractors to speed up weapons production by investing in new facilities and ending the practice of repurchasing stocks
Russian air attacks pound Ukraine, killing 3 and knocking out power in most regions
Trump Administration Orders Nearly 30 U.S. Ambassadors to Leave Their Posts
